import React, { useState } from 'react' import '../Styles/form.css' const axios = require('axios').default export default function Login() { const [carnet, setcarnet] = useState("") const [pass, setpass] = useState("") const autentication = ()=>{ var data = { DPI:carnet, PASS : pass } JSON.stringify(data) async function Autentication() { //aquí va la comunicacion con la api const info = await axios.post('http://localhost:3000/Autentication',data) alert(info.data.found) } Autentication() } return (
